name: Novacap Investments
overview: Novacap Investments, Inc. is a private equity and venture capital firm specializing in investments in retirement and management buyouts, partial cash out situations, restructuring, recapitalizations, privatizations, spin-offs, succession planning, and industry consolidations of middle market companies. It also invests in mid venture, late venture, mature, and turnaround transactions and provides growth capital. It prefers to invest in industries and technologies sector. In the technologies sector, the firm invests in information and communication technologies sector. It typically invests in the Quebec-Ontario area or within three hours of combined travel time from Montreal. The firm seeks to invest a minimum of CAD $10 million ($9.4 million). Novacap Investments, Inc. was founded in 1981 and is based at Quebec, Ontario.
